TableView.name: VIEW_SMP8_PMM
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP8_PMM" ("DATA", "REGIONAL", "SMP8", "SMP_A", "SMP_B") AS
WITH regionais AS
(SELECT REGIONAL.NOME AS regional, regional.* FROM REGIONAL WHERE indicador_smp = 'T'
),
dias AS
(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) data FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE - Level) FROM dual CONNECT BY Level < 15
),
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms AS
(SELECT * FROM regionais r, dias d
),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as
(select DATA, CENTRAL, CN, PMM, REGIONAL, UF, SMP8_A, SMP8_B from view_msc_vinculo_smp8 where codigo != 'NID'
),
dados_x_pmm AS
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
Reg.NOME AS regional,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP8_A, 0))), '0') AS SMP8_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP8_B, 0))), '0') AS SMP8_B
FROM
view_msc_cn_ativo_smp8 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN Cn Cn
ON Cn.Nome = Tab.CN
INNER JOIN Metricview.Rel_Regional_Cod_Nacional Reg_Cod
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Cn = Cn.Id_Cn
INNER JOIN regionais Reg
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Regional = Reg.ID_REGIONAL ,
dias dias
WHERE TRUNC(dias.data) = TRUNC(Tab.DATA)
and tab.central = b.msc
and tab.cn = b.cn
and to_date(to_char(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
and b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
Reg.NOME
),
dados_finais AS
(SELECT reg.data,
reg.regional,
CASE
WHEN dados.SMP8_B = '0'
AND dados.SMP8_A != '0'
AND to_number(dados.SMP8_A) >= 0
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP8_B = '0'
AND dados.SMP8_A != '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP8_A = '0'
AND dados.SMP8_B != '0'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SMP8_A / SMP8_B) * 100),2),'999990D99')), '0,00')
END AS SMP8,
smp8_a,
smp8_b
FROM dados_x_pmm dados,
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms reg
WHERE reg.data = dados.Data(+)
AND reg.regional = dados.regional(+)
)
SELECT dados_finais.data,
dados_finais.regional,
CASE
WHEN dados_finais.SMP8 != '0,00'
AND to_number(dados_finais.SMP8) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(dados_finais.SMP8,'.',',')
END AS SMP8,
smp8_a smp_a,
smp8_b smp_b
FROM dados_finais
ORDER BY 1,2,3;
TableView.userDefinedSQL:
WITH regionais AS
(SELECT REGIONAL.NOME AS regional,
REGIONAL.*
FROM REGIONAL
WHERE indicador_smp = 'T'
),
dias AS
(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) data FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE - Level) FROM dual CONNECT BY Level < 15
),
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms AS
(SELECT * FROM regionais r, dias d
),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo AS
(SELECT VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.DATA,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.CENTRAL,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.CN,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.PMM,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.REGIONAL,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.UF,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.SMP8_A,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.SMP8_B
FROM VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8
WHERE VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.CODIGO != 'NID'
),
dados_x_pmm AS
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
Reg.NOME AS regional,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP8_A, 0))), '0') AS SMP8_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP8_B, 0))), '0') AS SMP8_B
FROM VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP8 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN Cn Cn
ON Cn.Nome = Tab.CN
INNER JOIN Metricview.Rel_Regional_Cod_Nacional Reg_Cod
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Cn = Cn.Id_Cn
INNER JOIN regionais Reg
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Regional = Reg.ID_REGIONAL,
dias dias
WHERE TRUNC(dias.data) = TRUNC(Tab.DATA)
AND Tab.CENTRAL = b.MSC
AND Tab.CN = b.CN
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = b.PERIODO
AND b.STATUS = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
Reg.NOME
),
dados_finais AS
(SELECT reg.data,
reg.regional,
CASE
WHEN dados.SMP8_B = '0'
AND dados.SMP8_A != '0'
AND to_number(dados.SMP8_A) >= 0
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP8_B = '0'
AND dados.SMP8_A != '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP8_A = '0'
AND dados.SMP8_B != '0'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((dados.SMP8_A / dados.SMP8_B) * 100), 2), '999990D99')), '0,00')
END AS SMP8,
dados.SMP8_A,
dados.SMP8_B
FROM dados_x_pmm dados,
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms reg
WHERE reg.data = dados.Data(+)
AND reg.regional = dados.regional(+)
)
SELECT dados_finais.data,
dados_finais.regional,
CASE
WHEN dados_finais.SMP8 != '0,00'
AND to_number(dados_finais.SMP8) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE REPLACE(dados_finais.SMP8, '.', ',')
END AS SMP8,
dados_finais.SMP8_A smp_a,
dados_finais.SMP8_B smp_b
FROM dados_finais
ORDER BY 1,
2,
3
TableView.layoutSQL: With regionais As (Select REGIONAL.NOME As regional, REGIONAL.* From REGIONAL Where indicador_smp = 'T'), dias As (Select TRUNC(SysDate) data From dual Union All Select TRUNC(SysDate - Level) From dual Connect By Level < 15), regionais_x_dias_x_pmms As (Select * From regionais r, dias d), dados_traducao_sem_vinculo As (Select VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.DATA, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.CENTRAL, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.CN, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.PMM, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.REGIONAL, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.UF, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.SMP8_A, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.SMP8_B From VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8 Where VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP8.CODIGO != 'NID'), dados_x_pmm As (Select TRUNC(Tab.DATA) As Data, Reg.NOME As regional, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(SMP8_A, 0))), '0') As SMP8_A, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(SMP8_B, 0))), '0') As SMP8_B From VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP8 b, dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab Inner Join Cn Cn On Cn.Nome = Tab.CN Inner Join Metricview.Rel_Regional_Cod_Nacional Reg_Cod On Reg_Cod.Id_Cn = Cn.Id_Cn Inner Join regionais Reg On Reg_Cod.Id_Regional = Reg.ID_REGIONAL, dias dias Where TRUNC(dias.data) = TRUNC(Tab.DATA) And Tab.CENTRAL = b.MSC And Tab.CN = b.CN And to_date(TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = b.PERIODO And b.STATUS = 'T' Group By TRUNC(Tab.DATA), Reg.NOME), dados_finais As (Select reg.data, reg.regional, Case When dados.SMP8_B = '0' And dados.SMP8_A != '0' And to_number(dados.SMP8_A) >= 0 Then '0,00' When dados.SMP8_B = '0' And dados.SMP8_A != '0' Then '0,00' When dados.SMP8_A = '0' And dados.SMP8_B != '0' Then '0,00' Else NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((dados.SMP8_A / dados.SMP8_B) * 100), 2), '999990D99')), '0,00') End As SMP8, dados.SMP8_A, dados.SMP8_B From dados_x_pmm dados, regionais_x_dias_x_pmms reg Where reg.data = dados.Data(+) And reg.regional = dados.regional(+)) Select dados_finais.data, dados_finais.regional, Case When dados_finais.SMP8 != '0,00' And to_number(dados_finais.SMP8) > 100 Then '100,00' Else REPLACE(dados_finais.SMP8, '.', ',') End As SMP8, dados_finais.SMP8_A smp_a, dados_finais.SMP8_B smp_b From dados_finais Order By 1, 2, 3

viewElement.name: SMP8
viewElement.expression: Case When dados_finais.SMP8 != '0,00' And to_number(dados_finais.SMP8) > 100 Then '100,00' Else REPLACE(dados_finais.SMP8, '.', ',') End
